title: Ranged weapons

properties.name: description
properties.value: Ranged is an attack type that is used primarily by weapons like bows, crossbows and thrown weapons. In contrary to most melee weapons, ranged weapons can be used to deal damage to non-adjacent opponents up to a maximum range of 10 squares depending on the weapon type. Ranged weapons are associated with the Ranged combat skill.

content:
Ranged is an attack type that is used primarily by weapons like bows, crossbows and thrown weapons. In contrary to most melee weapons, ranged weapons can be used to deal damage to non-adjacent opponents up to a maximum range of 10 squares depending on the weapon type. Ranged weapons are associated with the Ranged combat skill.

Contents

    • 1.1 Exclusive
      • 1.1.1 Bows
      • 1.1.2 Chinchompas
      • 1.1.3 Crossbows
      • 1.1.4 Thrown weapons
    • 1.2 Secondary
      • 1.2.1 Salamanders
  • 2 Best Ranged attack bonus

Weapons[edit | edit source]

Exclusive[edit | edit source]

The following weapon types offer only ranged-based attacks.

Best Ranged attack bonus[edit | edit source]

Slot Image Item Ranged
bonus 		Notes
Armadyl helmet +10 Requires 70 and 70 to wear.
Necklace of anguish +15 Also gives +5 Ranged Strength. Requires 75 to use.
Armadyl chestplate +33 Requires 70 and 70 to wear.
Armadyl chainskirt +20 Requires 70 and 70 to wear.
Pegasian boots +12 Requires 75 and 75 to wear.
Ava's assembler +8 Requires completion of Dragon Slayer II, Vorkath's head and 70 to wear.
Twisted buckler +18 Requires 75 and 75 to wield.
Zaryte vambraces +18 Requires 80 and 45 to wear.
Archers ring (i) +8 The archers ring initially gives +4 Ranged bonus. However, players can imbue their ring via Soul Wars or the Nightmare Zone to double the ring's bonuses to +8.
Zaryte crossbow +110 Requires 80 to wield. Unlike other crossbows, the Zaryte crossbow grants defensive bonuses. It also has a passive effect that strengthens the effects of enchanted bolts by 10%.
Bow of faerdhinen +128 Requires completion of Song of the Elves alongside 75 and 70 to wield.
TOTAL +252 +252 if using a Zaryte crossbow and a twisted buckler.

bonus 		Notes

Justiciar chestguard +142 Requires 75 to be worn.
Justiciar legguards +102 Requires 75 to be worn.
Guardian boots +24 Requires 75 to wear.
Infernal cape +12 Requires completion of the Inferno.
Crystal shield +80 Requires 70 , 50 , and completion of Roving Elves to wield.
Barrows gloves +12 Requires the completion of Recipe for Disaster, along with a minimum of 175 Quest points.
Ring of suffering (i) +20 The Ring of suffering initially gives +10 Defence bonus. However, players can imbue their ring via Soul Wars or the Nightmare Zone to double the ring's bonuses to +20. Requires 75 to wear.
Zaryte crossbow +16 Requires 80 to wield. Unlike other crossbows, the Zaryte crossbow grants defensive bonuses.
Dinh's bulwark +148 Requires 75 and to wield.
TOTAL +542 +490 if using a Zaryte crossbow and a crystal shield.
